24 Olivia Allen

24 Olivia Allen

Career

Historical

Summary

Biography

2011-12 JUNIOR SEASON

Played in 22 games for the Lady Pirates, making her lone start of the season at IPFW on Nov. 26… averaged 1.4 points and 0.6 rebounds per game… went 11-for-37 (.297) from the floor… hit two of her 13 3-pointers (15.4 percent)… went 6-for-8 (75.0 percent) from the free throw line… scored a season-high seven points at Florida on Nov. 22… scored six points against Delaware State on Feb. 20… averaged 4.0 minutes per game.

BRADLEY UNIVERSITY

Averaged 3.9 points per game as a freshman… poured in 1.6 points per contest as a sophomore.

LAKE ZURICH SENIOR HIGH SCHOOL

Played basketball as a sophomore, junior and senior… averaged 10.0 points and 2.0 steals per game in her sophomore season… as a junior, averaged 13.0 points and three steals a game, earning First Team All-Area and First Team All-Conference honors… averaged 16.0 points and 3.0 steals per game as a senior… also ran for the track & field team all four years… finished sixth in the indoor and outdoor 200-meter dash at the state level as a freshman… finished third in the state in the 100-meter dash and fifth in the 200-meter dash as a senior.

PERSONAL

Born June 6, 1991… daughter of Audree and Henry Allen… has one brother, Derek (22)… was featured in the Daily Herald and Lake Zurich Courier… majoring in psychology… wants to play basketball overseas before becoming a personal trainer.
